title: UUEMB Extra Large Salad Bowl, 2800ml Ceramic Fruit Bowl, Stylish Navy Blue Bowl Round Vertical Stripe, Soup Bowl, Serving Bowl for Salad, Fruit, Noodle, Soup(23.5x8.8cm, 95oz)
description: Tableware Series---extra large tableware bowl for any occasion
The CERAMIC is thick and adopted retro kiln glaze technology, three-dimensional vertical stripes are outlined, and every detail is full of artistic conception.

✔ material: ceramic ✔ color: navy blue ✔ hand painted ✔ glazed glossy on both sides ✔inner: smooth ✔ outer: outter wall with vertical stripes ✔ easy to care for & food safe ✔ suitable for microwaves and dishwasher, not for oven ✔ modern & lively - european style bowls
Our ceramic bowl set is suitable for almost everything:
Breakfast bowl for a sunny start to the day. Serving bowl at brunch & snack for cheese, sausage, fruit etc. Fruit bowl is good for apple, peach, grape and much more.

Perfect for Christmas/Thanksgiving Gifts. This versatile tableware range designed for modern living includes, plates sets to bring style and functionality to any home and also best for party, birthday, wedding, anniversary.
Note: The item was taken in kind for the light, angle, display and other objective reasons, there is a slight color difference, please understand.
